content.text: The Corragut were a sentient species native to the planet Altawar, in the Corellian sector of the Core Worlds. Together with the Nosaurians of New Plympto and the Frozians of Froz, the Corragut were treated as a client species by the Corellians.
The Corragut were created for the Wizards of the Coast roleplaying game sourcebook, Coruscant and the Core Worlds, published in 2003.
